{value === index && children}
) } export const AuthRegPage = (props) => { const {t} = props; const [value, setValue] = useState(0); const handleChange = (event, newValue) => { setValue(newValue) }; const classes = useStyles(); return (
{t('auth_reg:bonus')}
{t('auth_reg:safeBuying')}

{t('auth_reg:signInTitle')} } id={0} /> {t('auth_reg:signUpTitle')} } id={1} />

{t('auth_reg:confirm')}
) };
